summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Landing Page Builder 'Sections' tab feature for Why Join and How It Works sections. All backend APIs (21/21 tests passed) and frontend UI components are working correctly. The Sections tab allows brands to add/edit/delete Why Join perks and How It Works steps. Public campaign landing page renders custom content from database with defaults if no custom content exists.
seed_data_creation: Reset test campaign with 3 Why Join perks and 4 How It Works steps
context_for_next_testing_agent: Landing Page Builder now has 3 tabs: Settings (basic config, testimonials, FAQs), Sections (Why Join perks and How It Works steps), and Custom HTML (HTML editor). All sections are editable with Add/Edit/Delete functionality. Preview shows real-time changes. Public landing page renders custom content from database with defaults if no custom content exists.
